persistence

Class PersistenceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • persistence.PersistenceManager

  • public class PersistenceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to access and edit the database DAO for the noiseProfiles also provides the function to simulate attrition of songs

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PersistenceManager(java.lang.String dbFilesLocation)
      creates a JsonDBTemplate to access the database

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addScratch(Scratch scratch)
      adds a new Scratch to the active NoiseProfile and persists it
      void clearProfile()
      clears all noise information of the active NoiseProfile and persists the changes
      NoiseProfile getProfile()
      reloads the active NoiseProfile and returns it
      NoiseProfile getProfile(java.lang.String id)
      returns the NoiseProfile searched by the given id
      void loadProfileFromDatabase(java.lang.String id)
      loads a file from the database and sets it as "active profile"
      void removeScratch(Scratch scratch)
      removes a Scratch from the active NoiseProfile and persists the changes
      void setAmplifier(int val)
      sets the amplifier filed of the active NoiseProfile and persists it
      void setConstantNoise(java.lang.String name)
      sets the constantNoise filed of the active NoiseProfile and persists it
      void setLengthOfFile(java.lang.String id, int length)
      searches the NoiseProfile by the given profile-id and sets its length
      void simulateAttrition(java.lang.String id)
      simulates the attrition of the currently loaded NoiseProfile randomly adds new scratches and constantNoise after a number of times played (or more exact number of attrition-simulations) defined in the config the amplifier for the noises is increased

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • loadProfileFromDatabase

        public void loadProfileFromDatabase(java.lang.String id)
                             throws PersistenceException
        loads a file from the database and sets it as "active profile"
        Parameters:
        id - id of the noiseprofile
        Throws:
        PersistenceException - if the length of the profile could not be calculated

      • getProfile

        public NoiseProfile getProfile()
                        throws PersistenceException
        reloads the active NoiseProfile and returns it
        Returns:
        the active noiseProfile
        Throws:
        PersistenceException - if the length of the profile could not be calculated

                        throws PersistenceException
        returns the NoiseProfile searched by the given id
        Parameters:
        id - the noiseprofile id
        Returns:
        the noiseprofile
        Throws:
        PersistenceException - if the length of the profile could not be calculated

      • setConstantNoise

        public void setConstantNoise(java.lang.String name)
        sets the constantNoise filed of the active NoiseProfile and persists it

        public void setAmplifier(int val)

      • removeScratch

        public void removeScratch(Scratch scratch)
        removes a Scratch from the active NoiseProfile and persists the changes
        Parameters:
        scratch - scratch which should be removed

      • clearProfile

        public void clearProfile()
        clears all noise information of the active NoiseProfile and persists the changes

      • setLengthOfFile

        public void setLengthOfFile(java.lang.String id,
                            int length)
        searches the NoiseProfile by the given profile-id and sets its length
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the noiseprofile
        length - the new length

      • simulateAttrition

        public void simulateAttrition(java.lang.String id)
                       throws PersistenceException
        simulates the attrition of the currently loaded NoiseProfile randomly adds new scratches and constantNoise after a number of times played (or more exact number of attrition-simulations) defined in the config the amplifier for the noises is increased
        Parameters:
        id - id of the noiseprofile
        Throws:
        PersistenceException - if the length of the profile could not be calculated
